notes:
v0.2.8: Release

- v0.2.8: Show release notes in update dialog - Fix release script to zip app before notarization - v0.2.7: Progress indicator & window detach fixes - v0.2.6: Context menu & Port forwarding fixes - v0.2.5: Per-tab sidebar state - Remove line gap between title and description - Remove horizontal line from README - Update README layout with centered icon - v0.2.4: Sidebar pin, Port forwarding UX, Context menu improvements - v0.2.3: Update app icons from app-icon.png
